Message.Msg: Not braging but to reinterate, bought in 05' for 41 and change, thoght it would never get thru 50, finely, after the split,sold half for 39 and change, and sold Jan calls on the rest. As i said befor it is not "always time for Coke". Best wishes to you who are still holding, as for me I'm leaving consumer goods for a while..

Topic.Title: What's with Coke? Nothing but down.

Message.Msg: Now is the time to buy !!! Buy as much as you can while the dip is here. There will be up's and downs for KO, But this is not a traders stock. It is a long term player. I have been buying KO for the last 30 years every month no matter what the price. It has made me alot of money and alot of shares. You have got to paient and KO will come through for you. You have got to buy it and forget it. !!! Long KO strong buy !!!

Topic.Title: What's with Coke? Nothing but down.

Topic.Title: What's with Coke? Nothing but down.

Message.Msg: I am sorry I believe you have been listening to way to many of these analyst that could not find their way out of a wet paper bag.!!! And sorry to bust your bubble, but I have been hearing for years that the time has come that buy and hold is over...Not true on KO..Maybe other stocks!!! KO is still a strong strong BUY !!!

Topic.Title: What's with Coke? Nothing but down.

Message.Msg: We have been in a recession for sometime now. I think the other post in re to insider trading is that the ones selling were selling at prime 50-80 dollars a share. And also the stock split they can sell and still have the same number of shares they started with, so in turn they have not lost any of their shares. But regardless the insiders have been selling along for the last 30 years that I have been investing in KO and it has not hurt me a bit...This happens in all major companies !!! Still a strong strong BUY !!!

Message.Title: For the ones worried about insider trading with KO
Message.Msg: If you will look at the time of all of these insider trades they came before the stock split came into effect. The pay date for this stock split was August 10, 2012. The NYSE changed the stock to 39 something dollars as a result of the split on August 13, 2012. So the insiders traded at approx 78-80 dollars and still probably still had the same amount of shares. I have seen this in just about all stock splits...
